title: [DEPS] Upgrade major dependencies for performance and security
body:
## Problem
Several major dependencies have newer versions available.

## Updates Needed
- @types/node: 20.17.46 → 22.15.28
- @vueuse/core: 10.11.1 → 13.3.0
- marked: 9.1.6 → 15.0.12
- uuid: 9.0.1 → 11.1.0
- eslint: 8.57.1 → 9.27.0

## Tasks
- [ ] Review breaking changes for each package
- [ ] Update packages incrementally
- [ ] Fix any breaking changes
- [ ] Run full test suite
- [ ] Update documentation

## Acceptance Criteria
- All packages updated
- No security vulnerabilities
- All tests pass
- Application functions correctly

## Priority: MEDIUM
## Effort: 13 story points
